<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bounty Hunter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1914) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 163 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Bounty Hunter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=52)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16)

</column>

---

When focused on finding your quarry, you're relentless. You gain the [Hunt Prey](/Actions.aspx?ID=10) action. You can use Hunt Prey to designate only a creature that you've seen, heard about, or learned about through some other means, such as a bounty board or wanted poster. In addition to the other benefits of Hunt Prey, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to [Gather Information](/Actions.aspx?ID=49) regarding your prey.

 If you already have Hunt Prey, you become an expert in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) and gain the circumstance bonus to Gather Information about your prey; you can still designate a creature you're tracking during exploration, in addition to the conditions above.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the bounty hunter archetype.

<title level="2">Bounty Hunter Dedication leads to...</title>
[Keep Pace](/Feats.aspx?ID=1917), [Opportunistic Grapple](/Feats.aspx?ID=1918), [Posse](/Feats.aspx?ID=1916), [Tools of the Trade](/Feats.aspx?ID=1915)
name: Bounty Hunter Dedication
